mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_num, lec_num, name, id, pw, category, phone, email, state, mem_ip) values(mem_seq.nextval,#{lec_num},#{name},#{id},#{pw},#{category},#{phone}, CASE WHEN #{email} LIKE '%@%' THEN #{email} ELSE CONCAT(#{email}, '@google.com') END, #{state},'106.241.247.83')
mapper.select: select pw from member where mem_num = #{mem_num}
select mem_num from member where id = #{id} and phone = #{phone}
mapper.update: update member set pw = #{pw} where mem_num = #{mem_num}
mapper.select: select * from member where lec_num = #{lec_num} and category = 'student'
mapper.update: update member set lec_num = (select max(lec_num) from lecture) where mem_num in (#{manager}, #{teacher})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where category = 'student' and lec_num = #{lec_num}
